name: Dataline
description:
Escape the heavily guarded fort Magnus with the stolen  specter armor a powerful power armor and fight through armored guards and robots that get in between you and freedom

Enemies

Guard

Shoots at a distance but is a coward at heart
Bulk Guard

The muscle of the four his brass knuckles do heavy damage
Custodian
Don't wake this guy up or you'll have a bad time
Seeker

It's directive search and destroy.

Credits Character, background art, and UIVolTitanDevLevel DesignVonkarmaProgramming Alvin Wolfgang, and Vonkarma
